member.name: M:WPF_Project.DataEncryption.Encrypt(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts provided using the as a password and returns encrypted data.

member.name: M:WPF_Project.DataEncryption.Decrypt(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts encrypted using the as a password. If the password is correct, then it returns decrypted data. In the other case it returns null.
member.returns: Decrypted data or null if the password is incorrect.
